# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2025-12-17

### Added
- Initial release of Wyld API client
- Support for HMAC-SHA256 authentication
- Generic payload schema validation with Pydantic
- Type-safe data retrieval with custom schemas
- Support for multiple device types and codecs
- Comprehensive examples and documentation
- Unit tests with pytest
- MIT License

### Features
- `WyldAPIClient` class for API interactions
- `BasePayload` and example schemas (Temperature, GPS)
- Flexible response parsing
- Error handling and validation
- Full type hints for IDE support
